infobox.Japanese title:: 消えた1ページ  (Kieta Ichi Pēji)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Detective Boys  Sumiko Kobayashi
infobox.Character design:: Mari Tominaga  Keiko Sasaki (sub-character)  Tomochi Kosaka (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Yuko Kato as Sumiko Kobayashi  Yoko Teppozuka as Tsukasa Naito  Masayo Kurata as Hiromi Osaki  Yuko Sato as Girl  Yuji Takada as Mr. Naito

sections.Situation: The Detective Boys are doing a book report when Ayumi notices that the last page to her book, Alec's Adventure, has been torn off. Conan and Ayumi decide to search for Tsukasa Naito, the one who borrowed out the book last. The Detective Boys later discover that a valuable stone, the Sairai Seki (再来石, lit. "Return Stone") was stolen. Conan realizes that Tsukasa must have stolen the stone believing it is the same stone from Alec's Adventure, Futabi no Ishi (再びの石, lit. "Again Stone"), due to the same kanji and wants to use it to regain a lost object. The Detective Boys' investigate Tsukasa's house and discover a piece of the torn page confirming Conan's suspicions.
